_data.title: _data
_data.description: Top level element of observation/sighting data.

@id.title: ID_PLACE
@id.description: Biolovision site identifier within local database

coord_lat.description: Site latitude, in WGS84 coordinate system

coord_lon.description: Site longitude, in WGS84 coordinate system

atlas_code.title: ATLAS_CODE
atlas_code.description: Atlas code, coded according to site preference

atlas_grid_name.title: GRID_NAME
atlas_grid_name.description: Atlas grid name of the observation

details.title: DETAIL
details.description: Details about the observation, exported as string

has_death.title: HAS_DEATH_INFO
has_death.description: Does this observation contain information about death cause (0: non death, 1: death without information, 2: death with information)?

hidden.title: HIDDEN
hidden.description: Is the observation hidden by admin or user?

id_sighting.title: ID_SIGHTING
id_sighting.description: Sighting reference within the Biolivision site

medias.title: MEDIA_HAS_MEDIA
medias.description: Observation contains media (photo or sound), if array length > 0

second_hand.title: SECOND_HAND
second_hand.description: Is the observation from another observer?
